HTML Injection: Use HTML escaping for user inputs.
JavaScript URI Injection: Avoid using javascript: in href attributes.
Inline Event Handler: Avoid using inline event handlers like onmouseover.
SVG Injection: Sanitize SVG content and avoid onload attributes.
Embedded Script Injection: Use CSP to block unsafe embedded content.
Image Onerror Injection: Sanitize input to prevent onerror attributes in image tags.
Form Action Injection: Avoid using JavaScript in form actions.
Base Tag Injection: Avoid using base tags with JavaScript.
Object Data Injection: Sanitize object tags to prevent unsafe data attributes.
Details-Summary Injection: Sanitize details and summary tags to prevent XSS.
Video Onerror Injection: Sanitize video tags to prevent onerror attributes.
Iframe Injection: Use CSP to block unsafe iframe sources.
Attribute Injection: Sanitize input to prevent script injection in attributes.
Quote Injection: Use proper escaping for quotes in user inputs.
SVG Animation Injection: Sanitize input to prevent script injection in SVG animations.
